introduction: Hao drove an unlicensed car for living, there was a cooperative relationship between he and Lv, who worked as a call girl.Hao always lose money in gamble, finally his car was detained by his disreputable friends. Lv took pity on him and tried to fetch the car back.Gradually, Hao swept the darkness in his heart and fall in love with Lv. One day, when Lv did her business with a master whoremaster, Hao burst into the room and persuaded Lv to gave up this job. There was a sharp conflict between their them and Lv decided to leave Hao's place.Afterwards Hao met a fortune-teller, he told Hao that Lv was an phantom lady and gave a amulet which was able to exorcise the evil spirits to drive out Lv.Hao was half - believe in this but used this amulet to scatter Lv. Hao felt lost and regret ,he decided to go to Qingcheng mountain to find Lv.
